post.author: Admin
post.title: Important Dates/Events Coming in August 2014
post.description:
Mark Your Calendars for These Important Dates in August 2014
Th
post.content:
Mark Your Calendars for These Important Dates in August 2014

  • Thursday, July 31: First practice with All Band members
  • Wednesday, August 13: Picture Day
  • Sunday, August 17: Parent Preview Night
  • Wednesday, August 20: First Day of School
  • Sunday, August 24: Home Days Parade
  • Friday, August 29: First Football Game (Away: Berea-Midpark)
